description: The Stablecoin Conversation Lands in Hong Kong Join us for the inaugural edition of Stablecon Salon in Hong Kong, an invite-only gathering powered by Xweave and OpenFX, held as a Consensus Week side event. We re bringing together Asia s sharpest minds across stablecoins, DeFi, and digital assets for an evening of connection and candid conversation. At a time when Hong Kong is fast emerging as a hub for digital finance, this off-the-record salon will explore the unique opportunities and infrastructure challenges for stablecoin adoption in Asia from regulatory clarity to cross-border settlement, trade finance, and on-chain liquidity flows. What to expect: Intimate conversations with leaders shaping the stablecoin ecosystem Unfiltered insights into the state of regulation and institutional interest in the region A first look at what s next for global stablecoin infrastructure Panel: Stablecoins in SEA - Separating Hype from Reality (6:30pm - 7pm) Theme: Hot Takes & Games! Speakers: Sergio Mello Global Head, Stablecoin Solutions, Anchorage Angela Ang Head of Policy & Partnerships, TRM Labs Kevin Kang Co-founder, Reap Jeannie Lim Co-founder & Head of BD, Xweave Moderator: Rocco Puno Head of New Business, SEA OpenFX Spots are limited. RSVP now to be part of the movement shaping the future of the internet of value.
